AppWorkWeb3.workDescription: Website created for a 3D studio specializing in motion design and offering a portfolio of works using various software.

AppWorkWeb4.workDescription: Landing page dedicated to tourism in Dagestan.

AppWorkJs1.workDescription: JavaScript quiz based on materials from learn.javascript.ru!

AppWorkJs2.workDescription: The project is a task planner with the ability to add, delete, edit, and mark tasks as completed. Completed tasks are moved to a separate list. Data is saved in local storage, and the interface includes animations for adding and removing tasks. Uses Vue.js, HTML, and CSS.

AppWorkJs3.workDescription: Develop using Vue, Vue Router, two pages of the Qpick online store. The first page is the product catalog, and the second is the cart with purchased items.

AppWorkJs4.workDescription: Website for a computer club, including sections with images of the club, a list of available games, pricing, and an embedded Yandex map to display the club's location. The site provides all the necessary information for visitors who want to learn more about the club's offerings and location.
